CalculatorPage.q1: Is the ‚Ç¨28,000 income Gross or Net?
CalculatorPage.a1: The law requires ‚Ç¨28,000 in Gross Annual Income. However, Consulates often ask to see this deposited into your bank account, so having a healthy Net income is crucial.
CalculatorPage.q2: Can I just book an Airbnb?
CalculatorPage.a2: Generally, No. Most Consulates (especially US and UK) reject temporary Airbnb bookings. You need a "Transitory Rental Contract" registered with the Agenzia delle Entrate.
CalculatorPage.a3: You cannot use standard travel insurance. You need a policy that covers ‚Ç¨30,000 minimum, with zero deductible for emergency hospitalization, valid in the entire Schengen Zone.
